translation.en: [narrator] The Flounders.
A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.de: Ein Team von Außenseitern aus dem Valley...

translation.en: assembled for one reason
and one reason only.
-[narrator] To fail. -[thuds]
-[spits] -[narrator] But they didn't fail.
They didn't exactly succeed, -but they didn't fail. -[Tyler grunts]
translation.de: Sie hatten aber auch nicht wirklich Erfolg.

translation.en: Thanks to a technicality,
they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu
translation.de: Nun wachen sie über die Strände von Malibu

translation.en: from Tower Two.
-[upbeat music playing] -[narrator] Tyler, the wise guy
with the great hair.
-Gina... -[grunts]
...the tough one.
Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.de: Dylan. Ihr Captain, sie hat viel zu beweisen.

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
And... Tyler--
-[Gina] Hold on. -[cell phone beeps]
-You already said Tyler. -I did?
You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
translation.de: Er war zuerst. Viel zu viel Tyler.

translation.en: I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
Of course you do.
"Spunky with a dark side"? I don't see it.
Oh! Did I tell you? My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.de: Mein Dad schnitt sich beim Rasen mähen drei Zehen ab.

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
translation.de: Mein Dad schnitt sich beim Rasen mähen drei Zehen ab. Nächstes Mal darf ich sie annähen.

translation.en: [giggling] I really hope there's a next time!
Oh. "Spunky with a dark side." I hear it now.
Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.de: Eric, das ist toll. Wer hat das gefilmt?

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.de: Hochzeiten und Bar-Mizwas filme ich auch.

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.de: Ein Foto eures ersten Tages als Juniorrettungsschwimmer.

translation.en: Everybody say, "Who's driving?"
[all] Who's driving?
Wait, who is driving?
[Dylan] Where are they?
Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
translation.de: Bitte kommt am ersten Tag nicht zu spät.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your "team"?
translation.de: Hallo, Dylan. Wo ist dein Team?

translation.en: You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier,
translation.de: Vorhin... ...roch es nach Valley-Müll, aber es war nur die Tonne.

translation.en: but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.de: ...roch es nach Valley-Müll, aber es war nur die Tonne.

translation.en: [laughing awkwardly] That's funny! You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
translation.de: Total witzig. Sie werden jeden Moment hier sein.

translation.en: Boop-boop! Oh, just got a text. [giggles]
-They're right around the corner. -Did you just say, "boop-boop"?
translation.de: Sie sind fast da. -Sagtest du "ding-ding"? -Nein, das war mein Handy.

translation.en: No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text. [laughs]
Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
-Click, click, click, click, click... -Your phone is wack.
Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain.
translation.de: Du hast nicht das Zeug zum Captain.

translation.en: Garvin should have never given you a tower.
Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
translation.de: Noch mal. Erics Kopf war im Bild.

translation.en: Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.de: Vooch filmt uns seit Wochen heimlich.

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
[gasps] All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
translation.de: Ich bin stolz auf euch. Haut rein heute!

translation.en: No, wait!
Save it.
-["Wedding March" playing] -[bus rattling]
You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
translation.de: Ihr habt es geschafft. Ihr seid Juniorrettungsschwimmer!

translation.en: -Yeah! -[chuckles] Yeah! Now what?
[Dylan] Malibu Beach.
Twenty-seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world,
translation.de: 43 km der schönsten Küste der Welt,

translation.en: and it's our job to protect all of it.
From the beach, from the water, from the air...
translation.de: Vom Strand aus, vom Wasser, aus der Luft.

translation.en: Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
translation.de: Nein, im All sind wir nicht zuständig.

translation.en: [Brody] All right!
Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on!
translation.de: Willkommen zum ersten Tag bei den Juniorrettungsschwimmern!

translation.en: [Brody] Now listen.
Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.de: Unser Job ist es nicht nur, am Turm abzuhängen und hübsch zu sein.

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One? -Come on. -[Tower One cheers]
translation.de: Aber einige können nicht anders. Was, Turm eins?

translation.en: Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning,
and I'm the one in charge of handing them out. [laughs]
Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.de: Egal, ob cool oder lahm, sie müssen getan werden.

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol.
-Come on! -[Tower One cheers]
Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
translation.de: Alle andern... lest die Tafel. Los!

translation.en: I wonder what assignment we got!
[sighs] This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir retten Leute vor Haien und rennen in Zeitlupe.

translation.en: -You know, cool stuff. -And we will.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir retten Leute vor Haien und rennen in Zeitlupe. Machen wir auch. Bis auf die Zeitlupe.

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that.
translation.de: Machen wir auch. Bis auf die Zeitlupe.

translation.en: But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got,
translation.de: Aber jetzt haben wir eine Aufgabe,

translation.en: and keeping the beach clean is important.
I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
translation.de: Auch wenn es nicht glamourös ist.

translation.en: You guys, I just checked Instagram,
and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
Any one of these piles could be his!
Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.de: Hier sind überraschend viele Haufen am Strand, oder?

translation.en: [Brody] Come on.
Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.de: Ich habe aufgestockt, damit ihr Loser euch nicht langweilt.

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.de: Er lieh sich dafür Hunde, und wir sind Loser.

translation.en: [Brody] Yes, I did.
-I'm gonna handle this. -[Dylan] Tyler, stop.
Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
translation.de: Er ist es nicht wert. Ignorier ihn.

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block
of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
-That was some good poopin', you guys! -[dog barks]
[laughs] Yes, it was.
I hate that guy.
[Eric] Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
and you, and me.
Lizzie, you want in on this?
No, thanks, I'm good.
Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
but I'm lovin' it right now.
-Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? -Yeah.
Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.de: Dank Brody muss ich die verbrennen.

translation.en: -What's his problem? -He's just trying to get to us.
translation.de: Was hat er nur? Er will uns nerven.

translation.en: -Well, it's working. -Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.de: Es klappt. -Du bist Captain, unternimm etwas. -Tue ich.

translation.en: -You have to do something. -I am.
I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody and focus on saving lives.
translation.de: Wir gehen zum Turm, vergessen Brody und retten Leben.

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go.
There's my least favorite tower.
-Got a couple more jobs for you guys. -But we already did all our assignments.
translation.de: Ich habe neue Aufgaben. Wir sind fertig.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
and it's up to me to make sure they get done... by you.
translation.de: Ich bin dafür verantwortlich, dass ihr sie macht.

translation.en: Buoy maintenance?
Swim fin disinfection?
It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.de: Als würden wir bewusst nur Mist abbekommen.

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, it is, isn't it?
That's not fair.
But, it is hilarious.
[Brody] What can I say?
When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.de: Die Demütigung vor dem Bürgermeister war eine Kriegserklärung.

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life?
Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.de: Dass du uns lobst und willkommen heißt.

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, joke's on you, brah. You'll never be one of us.
translation.de: Irrtum, Kumpel. Ihr werdet nie dazugehören.

translation.en: We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right?
No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us,
translation.de: Nein. Egal, was er uns aufbrummt,

translation.en: we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.de: wir machen es so gut, dass er uns akzeptieren muss.

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.de: Ich muss Dylan leider recht geben.

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
translation.de: Ja, genau! Auf dem rechten Weg.

translation.en: Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.de: Auf. Seepocken von den Bojen kratzen.

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer?
translation.de: Soll er uns den Sommer vermiesen?

translation.en: Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
[Dylan] What does that even mean?
It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.de: Wir erteilen ihm eine Lektion, die er nie vergisst.

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.de: Tyler, keiner traut uns diesen Job zu.

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.de: Wenn wir die Arbeit nicht machen, behalten sie recht.

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
translation.de: Als Captain sage ich, Bojen kratzen.

translation.en: And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.de: Sobald ich mit Brody fertig bin. Vertraue mir.

translation.en: Tyler! [sighs]
I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
translation.de: Ich fasse es nicht. Fasst du es?

translation.en: Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one.
I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.de: Man sucht sich das größte Kind und verdrischt es.

translation.en: [knuckles crack] Then everybody knows you're no one's punk. Sorry, Dylan!
translation.de: So wissen alle, was Sache ist. Sorry, Dylan.

translation.en: This is crazy!
Pretty much.
Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.de: Hier muss es etwas geben, um Brody reinzulegen.

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
Speargun.
-This will totally shut him up. -[fires]
Uh, maybe something less permanent.
translation.de: Das ist vielleicht doch zu endgültig.

translation.en: -[grunts, groans] -[equipment jangles]
Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
[Tyler, grunting] Over... here.
I wanna help get back at Brody.
Whoa!
Is it bad?
[chuckles softly] It's horrible.
Then why are you smiling? 'Cause I get to take 'em out.
translation.de: -Warum grinst du? -Weil ich sie entfernen darf.

translation.en: No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
translation.de: Oh nein. Das ist nicht nötig.

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good. [screams]
[Dylan] Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles.
translation.de: Hey. Wir haben die Bojen sortiert.

translation.en: That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
-Where are those guys? -[Dylan] They promised me
translation.de: Wo stecken sie denn? Sie kommen, wenn sie getan haben, was sie nicht tun sollten.

translation.en: they'd be right back as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.de: Sie kommen, wenn sie getan haben, was sie nicht tun sollten.

translation.en: So you just let them go?
No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.de: Nein. Sie haben einfach nicht auf mich gehört.

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team. We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
translation.de: Das ist nicht ok. Wir sind ein Team. Wir müssen zusammenhalten.

translation.en: -I'll go get them. -No, wait!
Seriously?
We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
translation.de: Wir sind kein Team, wenn alle gehen.

translation.en: -Why is nobody listening to me? -[Gina] Don't beat yourself up.
translation.de: Wieso hört niemand auf mich? Nicht deine Schuld, dass sie dich nicht respektieren.

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.de: Nicht deine Schuld, dass sie dich nicht respektieren.

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
-You think they do? -I did.
Oh... Well, they don't.
I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative.
translation.de: Es waren nicht genug Pflaster da.

translation.en: Thanks, Lizzie.
Uh, missed one. [chuckles]
[exhales] Okay.
Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Zeug, um Brody reinzulegen.

translation.en: Ooh, grab that rope.
I have an idea.
Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
[sighs] Hi, Eric.
[screams] They're alive?
I'm sorry about the mouth-to-mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.de: Das war mein erstes Mal Mund-zu-Mund.

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue!
translation.de: Ich wusste das mit der Zunge nicht!

translation.en: Eric... it's me.
[chuckles sheepishly] I knew that.
You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.de: Dylan, Gina und ich arbeiten allein.

translation.en: You gotta come help.
We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
translation.de: Wir helfen, indem wir uns Brody vornehmen.

translation.en: But Dylan said--
Dylan wants us to do this.
Then why did she tell you not to?
Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.de: Logisch, als Captain kann sie das nicht gutheißen.

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.de: Aber sie mag Brody auch nicht.

translation.en: -I don't know... -[Tyler] Well, I do!
-Tyler? Where are you? -[Tyler] Let's just say
I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks...
translation.de: Ich sprang nicht in die Angelhaken,

translation.en: [groaning] ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
[whispers] Yes, he did.
Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
translation.de: Wie soll ich ihren Respekt bekommen?

translation.en: First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.de: Stell nicht solche Fragen. Du bist Captain.

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
translation.de: Ok. Was würdest du an meiner Stelle...

translation.en: You're asking again.
[scoffs] When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
translation.de: Wann wurden die zuletzt sauber gemacht?

translation.en: Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.de: Mein halbes Team fehlt. Brody nimmt mich nicht ernst.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
Gross.
You're right. Doubting yourself is gross!
[sighs] But how can I not?
I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.de: Das ist mein dritter Sommer. Ich kenne mich hier aus.

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.de: Ich bin Captain, aber keiner nimmt mich ernst.

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working, and these fins are disgusting.
translation.de: Das solltest du ändern, denn die Flossen sind eklig.

translation.en: -[ominous cello music playing] -Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
-[creature snarls] -[gasps] Something in here just moved!
What is that?
Wait. Those look like tentacles.
-[ominous music grows louder] -Is that what I think it is?
translation.de: Ist es das, was ich denke?

translation.en: -Whoa. -[both panting]
You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right? [snickers]
translation.de: Ihr habt da was im Gesicht.

translation.en: That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.de: Jetzt reicht's! Ich mache ihn fertig.

translation.en: Gina, wait!
When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
translation.de: Wenn Brody kommt, tritt er aufs Netz.

translation.en: Which is attached to that parasail. All of which is attached to that Polaris.
translation.de: Da hängt ein Schirm dran. Alles ist mit dem Wagen verbunden.

translation.en: I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
translation.de: Ich ziehe Brody über den Strand,

translation.en: the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.de: bis er in die Luft geht und über dem Meer hängt.

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
translation.de: Wir machen ihn los und platsch!

translation.en: You can say "kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk." It's still a ker-felony!
translation.de: Ja, platsch, ins Gefängnis mit euch!

translation.en: This is crazy!
Is it crazy or is it crazy?
translation.de: Ist es irre, oder ist es irre?

translation.en: I'm not hearing the difference.
-Eric, we're doing this for the team. -What team?
Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.de: Die Rache an Brody spaltet das Team.

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
translation.de: Wir machen was. Dylan ist planlos.

translation.en: Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance. You ignored her.
translation.de: Du hast ihr keine Chance gegeben und sie ignoriert.

translation.en: I didn't mean to.
Well, you did.
It's our first day, and we're already falling apart.
Don't you get it?
This is exactly what Brody wants.
You're right.
Are you serious? We're bailing?
translation.de: Im Ernst? Wir lassen es sein?

translation.en: Yeah. We should be helping our team.
translation.de: Ja. Wir müssen dem Team helfen.

translation.en: I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
translation.de: Ich bringe den Wagen zurück, ihr holt das Netz.

translation.en: There. Fine. Take it apart.
I wanna help you take down Brody. No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
translation.de: -Ich helfe euch mit Brody. -Nein! Wir machen das nicht.

translation.en: "Cleaning the outhouses." Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
What the...
Help me!
[yells] There's dog poo in my hair!
[sobbing] Things like this don't happen to Brody!
-Whoa! -[Brody] Help me!
Yes, it worked!
Uh, which is very bad.
Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
translation.de: Tyler, das Netz hängt noch dran!

translation.en: [Brody] Help!
What's going on? [screaming]
Help me!
Oh, no!
[Brody] Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
[Brody] Ow, my boat key.
[gasps] What did you guys do?
Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank.
translation.de: Nichts. Wir wollten ihm nichts tun.

translation.en: Why'd you make it so dangerous?
-That's what I said. -It was Lizzie's idea.
-Which worked beautifully, by the way. -[Dylan] Enough!
You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.de: Ihr hört jetzt auf, mich zu ignorieren.

translation.en: I'm the captain. You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.de: Ich bin Captain, ihr macht, was ich sage, wie und wenn ich es sage.

translation.en: -You got a problem with that? -No.
No what?
No, Captain!
Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.de: Tyler, Gina, holt etwas, falls er fällt.

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.de: Lizzie, Eric, bringt Kletterzeug zum Wagen.

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, guys, let's go!
Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
translation.de: Zieht ihn hoch, wenn er eingehakt ist.

translation.en: [Brody] Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
Help!
Ow!
Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
translation.de: Du leitest die Rettung? Ich bin so gut wie tot.

translation.en: -[groans] -Will you stop? I got this.
[shouting] Please! Someone!
Anybody else!
[crying] Tower Two is the worst!
[yells] What are you doing?
You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.de: Du lässt uns ab sofort in Ruhe.

translation.en: No, I'm not!
Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
translation.de: Was machst du da? Spinnst du?

translation.en: -Stop it! -I will.
If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.de: Keine miesen Aufgaben mehr. Ab jetzt wird es fair.

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
translation.de: Ich will euch den Sommer versauen.

translation.en: -[Dylan grunts] -[Brody] Okay, fine, fine!
Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
Please get me out of here. [groans]
-[screams] -Get ready to pull him up!
Never mind!
[panting] I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
-Why isn't there a pump for this thing? -[panting] There is.
translation.de: Wieso gibt es keine Pumpe? Gibt es.

translation.en: -[Brody grunting] -We just don't have... an extension cord.
[shouting] She cut the rope! She's insane!
translation.de: Sie hat mich losgeschnitten! Sie ist irre!

translation.en: She cut the rope! Who does that?
translation.de: Sie hat mich losgeschnitten! Wer macht so was?

translation.en: -[whistle jangles] -Ow! I fell on my whistle.
Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.de: Du hast ihn fallen lassen. Echt krass.

translation.en: You are crazy.
No, she's crazy.
Still don't hear it.
Come on.
That was a surprisingly baller move.
Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady. [laughs]
Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident. Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
translation.de: -Ich sage nicht, dass es ein Versehen war. -Danke. Sie beten mich jetzt an.

translation.en: You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.de: Du hast recht. Du bist Captain und vielleicht...

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
translation.de: ...hätte ich heute auf dich hören sollen.

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna say to me?
I agree. You should've listened to me.
translation.de: Ja. Du hättest auf mich hören sollen.

translation.en: Come on, let's finish our assignments.
translation.de: Kommt, wir haben noch zu tun.

translation.en: Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.de: Nicht die Flossen. Ein Oktopus hat mich angepinkelt.

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
translation.de: Hast du dir die Hände gewaschen?

translation.en: I did not.
Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.de: Wir müssen noch kurz bei Adam Schwartzmans Bar-Mizwa halten.

translation.en: I'm Adam.
Today I became a man. Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
translation.de: -Ich bin jetzt ein Mann. -Arm weg, oder du warst einer.

translation.en: [Vooch] Hey, guys.
Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.de: Kennt ihr den Weg? Ich habe mich eventuell verfahren.

translation.en: -But I might be. -[engine sputtering]
♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
